TITLE: Episode 52 - All Porn is Gay Porn [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: In likely our most NSFW, if not most offensive, episode to date, I am joined by Thaddeus Preston from Thank You For Your Servers and Ryan Burgett from Techno-Agorist. We shoot the shit and talk about the brilliant methods of BLM, transphobia, homophobia, black culture, the Hotep movement, and whatever the hell Geechee is.
